Detailed Description

Class containing function for copying a string.

Definition at line 25 of file NewStrDup.h.

Member Function Documentation

char * NewStrDup::newStrDup (  const MC2String &  orig  )  [inline, static]
 

Returns a copy of the string orig allocated with new.

Only copies upto the length of the string, and then zero terminates.

Parameters:
orig Original string to copy.
Returns:
Copy of orig allocated with new.

Returns a copy of the string orig allocated with new.

Zero terminates the string if len is set.

char * NewStrDup::newStrDupNull (  const char *  orig,
int  len = -1
)  [inline, static]
 

Returns a copy of the string orig allocated with new.

Zero terminates the string if len is set. If orig is NULL then return value is NULL too.

Parameters:
orig Original string to copy.
Returns:
Copy of orig allocated with new.
